function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of infection due to underutilised office and business spaces with insufficient ventilation","Impact":"Higher risk of infection to healthcare workers and susceptible patients in healthcare buildings","Mitigation":"Implement measures to improve ventilation and air quality, such as the use of movable walls and 100% fresh outdoor air for mechanical ventilation systems","Technologies":"Movable walls, mechanical ventilation systems with outdoor air intake, renewable energy sources","People":"Healthcare workers, susceptible patients","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Increased energy consumption due to social distancing measures and ventilation requirements","Impact":"Higher energy consumption of buildings and healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Consider the impact of social distancing on energy consumption and prioritize the adoption of renewable energy sources to support acceptable indoor air quality","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, energy recovery systems","People":"Building owners, energy managers","Owner":"Building owners, energy managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate adoption of CE strategies leading to inefficient resource use and post-COVID-19 recovery","Impact":"Inefficient resource use, higher costs, and decreased competitiveness in post-COVID-19 recovery","Mitigation":"Implement CE strategies such as material reuse and recycling infrastructure to facilitate value circulation and efficient resource use","Technologies":"Material reuse, recycling infrastructure","People":"Building owners, environmental managers","Owner":"Building owners, environmental managers"}]}
